official_title: A bill to provide for the protection of users of consumer credit and charge cards, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fair Credit and Charge Card Disclosure Act of 1987

summary.text: Fair Credit and Charge Card Disclosure Act of 1987 - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to direct the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to issue regulations requiring that credit and charge card solicitations mailed to consumers include information regarding finance charge conditions, interest rates, and annual fees and related charges.
